author: Timothy Cummings
text:
I am curious to see how some municipalities write policy memos. I am hopeful individuals will be able to provide me with some differing sample memos as I try to develop a template for a memo relative to management issues/operational service delivery.
Ideally, I would like to see if there are standard categories/questions/subtitles you require addressed including the preferred length of a memo.
This memo may come from a budget analyst/project manager/department head to the Town Manager.
Any assistance would be greatly appreciated.
Kindest regards,
Tim C.
title: Looking for a Standard Policy Memo for a City/Town
